title: Delacroix Watch Face
summary: Dominique Delacroix is a luxury timepiece from a private watch manufacturer
developerAddress: Russia, Moscow, 123060 Marshala Biryuzova street, 40, flat 65.
description: Fans of traditional watchmaking, innovative technologies and creativity are certain to take close look into this masterpiece of steel elegance for your wrist.Dominique Delacroix, a private manufacturer of quality timepieces preserves a long tradition of luxury watchmaking and continues with innovations, providing it's first Android wear watch face, enriching the modern gadget with an elegant and classic design with a high recognition value.Premium Android Wear watch face now supports both round and square displays.FEATURES- Luxury premium android wear watch face - Dimmed mode supports reduced colours on older devices and full colour on modern devices for premium look- Realistic look without battery drain- Square design provides interesting visual paradox, where parallel lines seem to be curvy because of carefully chosen colours and textures- After installing on the smartphone, the app automatically installs on the connected smartwatch. Effective installation will be finished with a pop up on message on the smart watch. You can activate the watch face from the smartwatch: Long press on the current watch face, swipe right until you see Delacroix watch face. Press on it to select it.If the Application doesn't appear:- uninstall the face- restart device- connect smartwatch and phone- install the app-let us know and we help youIf you have any questions, happy with the watchface, not happy with the watchface, have suggestions on new design or features, let us know at vdatainsight@gmail.comThe application is running on Moto 360, LG Watch R, Asus Zenwatch, Sony Smart Watch 3, Huawei, LG Urbane 1
descriptionHTML:
Fans of traditional watchmaking, innovative technologies and creativity are certain to take close look into this masterpiece of steel elegance for your wrist.

Dominique Delacroix, a private manufacturer of quality timepieces preserves a long tradition of luxury watchmaking and continues with innovations, providing it's first Android wear watch face, enriching the modern gadget with an elegant and classic design with a high recognition value.

Premium Android Wear watch face now supports both round and square displays.

FEATURES
- Luxury premium android wear watch face
- Dimmed mode supports reduced colours on older devices and full colour on modern devices for premium look
- Realistic look without battery drain
- Square design provides interesting visual paradox, where parallel lines seem to be curvy because of carefully chosen colours and textures
- After installing on the smartphone, the app automatically installs on the connected smartwatch. Effective installation will be finished with a pop up on message on the smart watch. You can activate the watch face from the smartwatch: Long press on the current watch face, swipe right until you see Delacroix watch face. Press on it to select it.

If the Application doesn't appear:
- uninstall the face
- restart device
- connect smartwatch and phone
- install the app
-let us know and we help you

If you have any questions, happy with the watchface, not happy with the watchface, have suggestions on new design or features, let us know at vdatainsight@gmail.com

The application is running on Moto 360, LG Watch R, Asus Zenwatch, Sony Smart Watch 3, Huawei, LG Urbane 1
recentChanges: Support of square screens has been added, low colours ambient mode has been added, minor bugs has been fixed.
